dct_title_s: The land of Moriah or Jerusalem and the adjacent country
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially and by hachures.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
3 bar scales on map given in "Jewish cubits", "Roman miles", and "English miles".
Shows topography, drainage, roads, places of historical interest, references to biblical verses.
"IV" -- top left corner ; "2" -- top right corner.
Appears in Wilkinson's Atlas classica ... London, 1823. Geographia sacra, No. 7.
